thread.title: outstanding decoration and very good bed
thread.title_full: outstanding decoration and very good bed - Review of BEST WESTERN Premier Opera Faubourg, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jean-michel S
title: outstanding decoration and very good bed
text: I loved the French toasts at the breakfast buffet and the hotel lounge sounds very inviting after a busy day or for an informal chat. I also liked the removal hangers which make it easier to deal with the suits and shirts, especially when you arrive late in the evening and only dream of falling in your bed... But the overall impression is certainly the designer decoration which conveys both a warm and extraordinary ambiance
